about.description: Galaga is a business innovation agency that accompanies companies in their digital transformation.
about.originsText1: Galaga was born from the intersection between traditional business experience and the creative universe of gaming.
about.originsText2: With more than 35 years of family experience in commercial spaces and the creation of Team Galaga in 2018.
about.integrationText: that dual vision: traditional business solidity and the creativity of the gaming world.
about.humanityText: We innovate with you, not for you
about.actionText: We don't just plan, we make it happen
about.usefulCreativityText: Ideas that solve, not just decorate
